name: Pipou The Spider
description:
PIPOU THE SPIDER is a game where you are a spider trying to complete mini games on an arcade machine without getting squished !

Use your whole Spider body to push the button, try to complete the games and get the best score you can !

****HOW TO PLAY****

Left Directional Arrow/Right Directional Arrow to navigate.

Space to Jump.

The First game is a Flappy Bird like game :  
- The First Arcade Button is used to "Jump".

The Second Game is a game where you have to dodge the falling Rocks :
- The first Arcade Button and the Second one are the one that'll make you go to the "Left" or to the "Right".

The Third Game is a game where you have to follow the order indicated :
- The First Arcade Button is "Attack!"
- The Second Arcade Button is "Dodge!"
- The Third Arcade Button is "Defend!"

****Credits****

Game Designers : Phimphisay Kellian / Schade Jeremy

Game Artists : Pividori Lara (2D Animation) / Amouyal Roxane

Game Programmers : Vincent Lorenzo / Edgar Covarel

****Soundtrack**** 

Menu : Castlevania Order of Ecclesia (Nintendo DS) - An Empty Tome" 
Ingame : Castlevania 2 (NES) - Bloody Tears

****Notes****
The game still have a lot of bugs that need to be fixed, things that will of course happen from the next months to come with even more features !
Consider this game as a 0.5 version D:
